QuestData.Title: Pushing Back
QuestData.Description: Da Twilight's Hammer have destroyed a Dragonmaw town to the south and are performin' dey're summonin' rituals from there. Offer dem no respite to continue wit dey're incantations. Bring tha battle to dem!
QuestData.LogDescription: Kill 12 Twilight's Hammer at the Ruins of Drakgor.
QuestData.CompletionText: All over da highlands, da Twilight pervert da elements and turn dem against us. We've witnessed unbearable horrors at dey're hands. I'm eager to see dem slaughtered.
QuestData.RewardText: Revenge is bittersweet, but I'm glad we be havin' someone as powerful as you do see dis done.
